application

Class LosAlgoritmos

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.LosAlgoritmos

  • public class LosAlgoritmos
extends java.lang.Object
    Functionality for managing the different routing algorithms. The routing algorithms save all necessary information to the vertices on the VertexMatrix (the map)

    • Method Detail

      • route

        public Stack<Vertex> route(int[] start,
                  int[] goal,
                  int algo,
                  int heuristic,
                  boolean diagonalMovement)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Routing with specified settings, returns the shortest route.
        Parameters:
        start - start coordinates y,x of the route.
        goal - end coordinates y,x of the route.
        algo - chosen algorithm, algorithms provided in LosAlgoritmos as final static integers.
        heuristic - chosen heuristic, heuristics provided in LosAlgoritmos as final static integers.
        diagonalMovement - true -> diagonal movement allowed. Always allowed for JPS.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if any input is invalid.

      • getDistance

        public double getDistance()
        Return the distance of the shortest route found by the last run algorithm.
        Returns:
        distance from start to goal.

      • loadCharMatrix

        public void loadCharMatrix(char[][] charM)
        Loads the desired map to be used by the routing algorithms.
        Parameters:
        charM -

      • comparisons

        public int comparisons()
        Return the number of comparisons done by the routing algorithm that was last run.
        Returns:
        comparisons.

      • getVertexMatrix

        public Vertex[][] getVertexMatrix()
        Get currently loaded vertex matrix (map).
        Returns:
        vertexMatrix.

      • printAllDistances

        public void printAllDistances()
        Prints the map as the distance values of the vertices to the console. For debugging.

      • printAllToGoals

        public void printAllToGoals()
        Prints the map as the toGoal values of the vertices to the console. For debugging.

      • printMapWithRoute

        public void printMapWithRoute()
        Prints the map and the found route (all vertices with .isOnPath == true) to the console. For debugging.
